Name: Shape
About the game: You are reborn from the void. As your Ego, explore the Maze and take Shape. Shape is an experimental game about perception and an invitation to introspection. The player must escape from a maze, with sole ally his shadow. Features Freedom to Explore At Your Pace Maze Filled With Puzzles and Tricks Conversations With Your Shadow Your Own Shape Puzzles Explore and interact with the maze. Shadow You are the shadow you cast.
Meta Title: Shape: Sep 18, 2020, Igor Neiman and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Shape? Check out the release date (Sep 18, 2020), developer insights from Igor Neiman, and a complete game summary.
